QuestData.Title: The Lorewalkers
QuestData.Description: So you are interested in learning more of the lore of this land?$B$BVery well! You should speak to Lorewalker Cho at the Seat of Knowledge.$B$BHe can be found in the room above the entrance to the Mogu'shan Palace. Speak with Mishi for a ride.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Lorewalker Cho at the Seat of Knowledge in the Vale of Eternal Blossoms.
